@StrandedinIndia @PayalChaddha3 @UKinIndia @JanThompsonFCO @Kieran_drake We are sorry to hear about the situation. As we are in a nation-wide lockdown, there are some restrictions on inter-state travel. Can you provide us more details about the affected persons. We will try to help them.

*CMO Kerala COVID19 Centre* CMO Kerala has started a COVID19 Centre on Twitter. You can connect with us here. We will listen and respond to your SOS messages and requests. Please tags us in your messages.

@keithppereira Yes. Most private hospitals and many private practitioners provide virtual consultation.

If you have any ONE or more symptoms (cough, fever, sore throat, severe headache, diarrhoea, body pain) Do these steps in order 1. Isolate 2. Measure temperature Oxygen 3. Seek telephonic consultation 4. Discuss with doctor if you need COVID test Remember 1 is Isolate
